briefTitle: The Safety and Tolerability of Alpha-1 Modified Process (MP) In Subjects With Alpha-1-antitrypsin (AAT) Deficiency
officialTitle: Multi-center, Open-label Trial to Evaluate the Safety and Tolerability of Alpha-1 MP in Subjects With Alpha-1-antitrypsin (AAT) Deficiency
summary: The purpose of this clinical study is to assess the safety and tolerability of Alpha-1 MP in adult Alpha1-antitrypsin deficient patients.

primaryOutcome.measure: Treatment-emergent Adverse Events (TEAEs) Defined as Any Adverse Event (AE) Occurring During or After the Start of the First Study Drug Infusion.
